experience.title: Backend Developer Intern
experience.description: • Worked on building an ERP SaaS system in manufacturing industry especially for the travellers.• Deployed Application Performance Monitor(APM) to visualize the data from API calls of the system. Debug and lint the code and implemented the models in Django web framework as suggested by the frontend team.
